head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHEICHET, STELLA JOAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHEICHET, STELLA JOAN

block.p: SCHEICHET--Stella Joan, on January 8, 2007. Beloved wife of the late Louis, devoted mother of David Scheichet (Paula), Judith Brenner (Larry), and Alicia Oberstein (Samuel), cherished grandmother of Steven, Andrew, Jeffrey, Dennis, Elana, Ari, and Peter and loving great-grandmother to Amanda, Lauren, Ashley, Madeline, Jack, Olivia, Arielle, and Eden. Interment private.
